childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Wooden Spoon
  • Cup
  • Jug
  • Tablespoon
  • Teaspoon
  • 2 cups of plain flour
  • 1 cup of salt
  • 2 teaspoons of cooking oil
  • A few drops of food colouring

Mix the ingredients together with 2 cups of boiling water, knead and allow to cool.

It is great to add ingredients such as porridge oats, rice or food colouring, be warned though, children may eat it!

The play dough will keep for a week in an airtight container.

It is great to allow children to make their own play dough. In this case use one cup of cold water instead of boiling water.
